unpack .zip
write you credentials in the 'cred.yaml'
run Generate_report.exe
close console when it says that it's completed



WORNINGs:
- all files should be personal
- password should not contain special characters ('!' is allowed)
- if the folder 'new_reports' already exist, delete it before the start of the run of .exe file
- URA should be ON
- Google Chrome should be installed on the computer
